title: [Note: i understand this voids warranty but inner nerd must have full control] Is pixel Rootable?
content: Root the pixel 4xl for complete control, interchangable custom OS's just to see if i can, complete admin/developer access and control over a $1000.00 device that is my property to use however i see fit for asking price. If this isnt possible its not worth $5.00 in my book. [It is <--just nerdy a##hole 2yr old tantrumish comment from inner control issues ;)lol ) js it would be nice
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
